p: The computation of the effects of the eruption of Mount Pinatubo on GMSL using the NCAR LE of models ( 21) is described in ref. 12. Because this model ends in 2010, we assumed an exponential decay from 2010 to the present. This correction increases the quadratic acceleration estimate by 0.02 mm/y 2. The error in this correction was estimated from the variance of the NCAR LE at 0.01 mm/y 2.
